review: such a fun game loved playing it and can easily play it again I did rage at the end a bit cuz ity got realy hard but its good that this is that challenges the player 8/10

Unfortunately the endng is paramount and... it leaves you hanging(I NEED CLOSURE). But it is a beautiful game with some great story telling  and music. Did i enjoy this game? Yes Will i recommed it ? ehh maybe Am i disapointed? yeah, there is too much potential, which really bugs me6/10
